sentences.en: The six-month strike seemed to be petering out.
sentences.cn: 持续了6个月的罢工似乎在逐渐停息。

sentences.en: The sensational verdict climaxed a six-month trial.
sentences.cn: 那项引起轰动的裁决使长达六个月的审判达到了高潮。

sentences.en: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.
sentences.cn: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。
